text: O ona verit nie observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) chvila intoxicated so ze ona zauzlit co ona saying Nor after sexual orgasm kupel unless ona je cesta cestovat ona bol chory cestovat ona had urinary fecal-related excretion such mat rad gas zmluva zensky (sexually) ona nie zalozit zavlazit ona observe Tayammum dry ablution) touching cisty dry znecistit potom wiping tvoj faces hands therewith! GOD bol Pardoner Forgiver
